name: Ideaz Global
description: Ideaz Global a IT software company.
overview:
Ideaz Global a pioneer in IT software solutions and IT software services sector with a global presence in offshore software development. We understand clients and provide IT software solutions, offshore software development services.
    For more than a decade excelling in the industry space of IT, Ideaz Global has emerged as a pioneer in both IT software and services sector. With a global presence and offshore development facilities, we go out of our way to propel your success through our solution driven methodology. 
    We take pride in understanding our client&#8217;s needs bearing their success in our minds and work closely with them with an objective to provide with the best solution to their needs enabling them to realize their state of abstraction. 
    Our approach of reality to web development and application helps you to visualize beyond the technical jargons and we ease you to get inflated, unlocking the doors of opportunities all through your way.

milestones.description: Our company has carved a niche for itself as a global software service provider. Specializing in offshore software and web application development, Ideaz Global has successfully implemented many full life cycle projects in a span of 10 years.
